double Polynome::operator() ( double  x1) const

Calcul de la valeur du polynome au point x1.

Returns:
double
Signification: valeur du polynome
Contraintes:

Definition at line 87 of file Polynome.cpp.

References coeff_, and DoubleTab::dimension().

{
  int n=coeff_.dimension(0);
  int i=0;
  double xi=1;
  double sum=0;
  while(n--)
    {
      sum+=coeff_(i++)*xi;
      xi*=x1;
    }
  return sum;
}
double Polynome::operator() ( double  x1,
double  x2 
) const

Calcul de la valeur du polynome au point x1,x2.

Returns:
double
Signification: valeur du polynome
Contraintes:

Definition at line 120 of file Polynome.cpp.

References coeff_, and DoubleTab::dimension().

{
  int n1=coeff_.dimension(0);
  int n2=coeff_.dimension(1);
  int i=0;
  int j=0;
  double xi=1;
  double xj=1;
  double sum=0;
  while(n1--)
    {
      xj=1.;
      n2=coeff_.dimension(1);
      j=0;
      while(n2--)
        {
          sum+=coeff_(i,j++)*xj*xi;
          xj*=x2;
        }
      xi*=x1;
      i++;
    }
  return sum;
}
double Polynome::operator() ( double  x1,
double  x2,
double  x3 
) const

Calcul de la valeur du polynome au point x1,x2,x3.

Returns:
double
Signification: valeur du polynome
Contraintes:

Definition at line 169 of file Polynome.cpp.

References coeff_, and DoubleTab::dimension().

{
  int n1=coeff_.dimension(0);
  int n2=coeff_.dimension(1);
  int n3=coeff_.dimension(2);
  int i=0;
  int j=0;
  int k=0;
  double xi=1;
  double xj=1;
  double xk=1;
  double sum=0;
  while(n1--)
    {
      xj=1.;
      n2=coeff_.dimension(1);
      j=0;
      while(n2--)
        {
          xk=1.;
          n3=coeff_.dimension(2);
          k=0;
          while(n3--)
            {
              sum+=coeff_(i,j,k++)*xk*xj*xi;
              xk*=x3;
            }
          xj*=x2;
          j++;
        }
      xi*=x1;
      i++;
    }
  return sum;
}
double Polynome::operator() ( double  x1,
double  x2,
double  x3,
double  x4 
) const

Calcul de la valeur du polynome au point x1,x2,x3,x4.

Returns:
double
Signification: valeur du polynome
Contraintes:

Definition at line 234 of file Polynome.cpp.

References coeff_, and DoubleTab::dimension().

{
  int n1=coeff_.dimension(0);
  int n2=coeff_.dimension(1);
  int n3=coeff_.dimension(2);
  int n4=coeff_.dimension(3);
  int i=0;
  int j=0;
  int k=0;
  int l=0;
  double xi=1;
  double xj=1;
  double xk=1;
  double xl=1;
  double sum=0;
  while(n1--)
    {
      xj=1.;
      n2=coeff_.dimension(1);
      j=0;
      while(n2--)
        {
          xk=1.;
          n3=coeff_.dimension(2);
          k=0;
          while(n3--)
            {
              xl=1.;
              n4=coeff_.dimension(3);
              l=0;
              while(n4--)
                {
                  sum+=coeff_(i,j,k,l++)*xl*xk*xj*xi;
                  xl*=x4;
                }
              xk*=x3;
              k++;
            }
          xj*=x2;
          j++;
        }
      xi*=x1;
      i++;
    }
  return sum;
}
